Title: Jade Forest
Description:
Treasured and venerated for thousands of years in Asian culture, Jade is a powerful mineral epitomising purity. Our quest for product excellence brought us to this hidden gem, carrying a light, and nourishing energy, perfectly encapsulating what we have to offer. For those who appreciate the finer things in life, one sip of Jade forest will elevate you to a higher state of consciousness and will refresh your palate and revitalise your soul.​
Inspired by the open skies, fresh air and quality experiences that come with it, our beverages have been developed using honest ingredients and flavours that are closest to nature. Countless tastings later, we’ve sourced just the right elements in perfect proportion to create a blend that forms a full and bountiful flavour, free from any artificial sweeteners or unnatural colours. We believe good products also give the most pleasure, so we bring you hydration in its most healthy form.
Address: New Delhi

VATSALA JAIN

Title: I Say Organic
Description:
As an organization, we are committed to serving the purest, most natural form of food available to us. Constantly innovating and working towards a world free of chemicals, we pride ourselves on delivering to you, only what is worthy of being served at your home - Pure organic food. We conduct frequent lab tests and audits to ensure we are living up to our promise! In turn, our farmers trust us with their products and we trust you to make the right choice.
The Purpose: (From the founder)
When you eat well; you feel good. But what is good food? It is more than just taste and texture. It’s where it comes from. It’s who grows it. It’s what goes into it. It’s who it feeds. It’s simple. It’s natural. We dream for this food to be everywhere. For it to be the only kind of food available. And for the tag “organic” to disappear as a result. We exist to contribute to building that future. Organic is not a lifestyle. It’s life itself.
Address: Lower Ground 15, South Point Mall, Golf Course Road, Gurgaon , Haryana,New Delhi ,122003

Title: The LuxePass
Description:
Book your Pass
Visit our Website or Android / iOS application.
Choose a luxury Hotel and amenity in your area. Select your preferred date and time. You will receive an email and text message with your
LuxePass.
You can either pay online or by cash/card at the Hotel.
LuxePass is 100% refundable on cancellations
Check-in
Carry your valid photo ID card and enter the OTP provided to you at the front desk of the Hotel.
The LuxePass only allows access to Hotel facilities reserved by you. It does not allow access to Hotel rooms.
Complimentary non-alcoholic welcome drink and discount vouchers for food & beverages at some Hotels.
Enjoy and Book Again!
Relax and enjoy Hotel facilities that offer luxury and privacy. You can swim, enjoy a workout at a luxurious gym and experience a top-notch spa treatment. Live every day like a vacation! Do book again if you enjoyed the experience. Make sure you provide a review as we are always looking forward to improving our services!

Title: HEART and SOUL Events
Description:
Heart and Soul is a match making service for discerning singles.
We fully understand the importance and the rightful need for privacy when it comes to matters such as these. And hence, we go all out to ensure that you meet like minded people in a comfortable and friendly setting. Our aim is for you to feel free and be at your best during interactions.
Given the modern day need and the profile of our clientele, we go the extra mile to specially curate events that are diverse in nature.
We deliberately keep our events a little more private by inviting smaller numbers in order for you to have a meaningful experience. By the end of the evening, you can remember names, recall who you had a meaningful connection with and given that strive to maintain and an almost.equal men to women balanced ratios, the whole deal makes it completely worth your while.
Most importantly, apart from the above, we have a screening process to make sure that all our events offer a safe, welcoming and inclusive environment where members feel confident about reaching out and forming connections with each other.
We have categorized our events in the following manner:
- Interactive Mixers: specially designed to have fun & ‘break the awkwardness’. A Must do!!
- Niche events curated around the activity of your interest: Do you have a hand for cooking or painting? Perhaps both? Reading or movies and much more. Wouldn’t this be a lot more fun to share it with that someone special. Come Discover!!
- Stimulating Workshops: specially designed & integrated with the sole aim for you to find YOUR-SELF. Come Seek!!
We also have a bespoke matchmaking making service where Match Making where we assist you in finding your in finding your proverbial ‘princess’ or ‘knight’ not in shining Armour.

The resort is located in the centre of the Spiti Valley, a place so above the sea level that it gives a snow-deserted view of the mountains all year long. Lily ponds and water lined walkways are common soothing elements around the cottages, restaurant and the large infinity pool.
Address: State Highway 45

Title: The Hosteller
Description:
Welcome to The Hosteller. We are one of the fastest growing hostel chains in India, who believe in budget facilitation and maximum interaction. Our design-led hostels are built and spaced in such a way that you get the best of facilities, meet the best of people and experience the best of the local and global hostel culture. Our aim is to make India travel more. And India can travel more when they can stop saving up for trips months in advance and wasting away precious time making and breaking the same plans again and again. In our stylish yellow-black themed hostels, we provide clean and safe housing facilities, secured lockers, a well-stocked common kitchen, air conditioners, paid laundry services, equipped libraries, exclusive female dormitories, travel and transport services, a colourful and well stocked cafe, well lit common rooms, and wide open spaces where our fellow travellers can bond over cups of lip-smacking coffee. Each of our destinations also has an energetic travel desk, who are more than eager to help you out with any queries or scheduling. If you are a solo traveller, here is the one place you will never feel alone.
In the last four years; we have set up shop in more than 5 beautiful locations in India, hosted a whopping 20,000 travellers, entertained more than 1500 trekkers (750+ of whom are women) and garnered an excess of 900 positive reviews. Our team comprises of enthusiastic travellers who plan for everything in the most personal and authentic way possible. And it is all for YOU! What differs us from other hostels and establishments out there is our pocket-friendly travel packages that allow for you to have an all-encompassing experience of the entire town/city. Whether it be mountain treks, bungee jumping, river rafting, food walks, photography walks, city pub crawls, game nights, movie nights, star gazing bonfires, overnight camping trips – we have it all. And all of this – without creating a dent in your straining bank account. We pride ourselves on creating authentic as well as memorable experiences and friendships for our travellers, that stretch well beyond the vicinity of our hostels; and last well beyond the vicinity of your vacation. Come to The Hosteller, make a bunch of cool friends and avail our ever-expanding excursions to be whisked away to an adventure of your own.
Address: 123/1, Saidulajab, Saket, New Delhi, 110030 New Delhi, India
Phone: Also Available in: Bir, Kasol, Jaipur, Pushkar, Manali & McLeodganj

Title: Rosie's Retreat Homestay
Description:
Rosie's Retreat Homestay is nestled on the banks of lake Pichola in Udaipur, Rajasthan.
It comprises of two apartments, Lakeside and Studio.
The lakeside apartment overlooks the lake and has it's own private roof terrace,luxury bathroom, equipped kitchen and breakfast terrace. It is fully air-conditioned and free Wifi is offered. A daily cleaning service is provided.
It has been lovingly furnished and decorated by Rosie with carefully sourced antique and vintage treasures from around Rajasthan and Gujarat.
The Studio is the apartment on the ground floor of the house which does not have a lake view or a terrace. It is fully air-conditioned and has an attached luxury bathroom, minibar fridge and tea and coffee making facility.
Rosie buys and sells eclectic vintage items from around the region and designs a range of cushion and bolster covers using vintage Rabari and Banjara hand worked textiles from Gujarat.
Address: 42, Nav Ghat, Udaipur, Rajasthan

Title: Thikana In The Foothills
Description:
Set amongst the lush reserve forests of Anglia in the foothills of the Himalayas in the district of Dehradun, Thikana at Bharatwala is the classically restored home of Rachna and Dushyant Singh. When you come to us you will have the opportunity to take part in the rich culture of the people who have lived here in the foothills for centuries and who continue to follow traditional agricultural practices. You will have the opportunity to visit the surrounding family farms, homes and villages, and experience the peaceful beauty of the mountainous vistas.
This beautiful boutique homestay is nestled in the middle of the Himalayan foothills, an optimal location for cultural excursions, interaction with villagers, and relaxation in nature. We are happy to host you as our own guest, with deliciously fresh food, breathtaking views, and a warm, welcoming atmosphere.
Address: Thikana at Bharatwala, Bisht Gaon Dehradun, Uttarakhand, India

Book your Pass
Visit our Website or Android / iOS application.
Choose a luxury Hotel and amenity in your area. Select your preferred date and time. You will receive an email and text message with your
LuxePass.
You can either pay online or by cash/card at the Hotel.
LuxePass is 100% refundable on cancellations
Check-in
Carry your valid photo ID card and enter the OTP provided to you at the front desk of the Hotel.
The LuxePass only allows access to Hotel facilities reserved by you. It does not allow access to Hotel rooms.
Complimentary non-alcoholic welcome drink and discount vouchers for food & beverages at some Hotels.
Enjoy and Book Again!
Relax and enjoy Hotel facilities that offer luxury and privacy. You can swim, enjoy a workout at a luxurious gym and experience a top-notch spa treatment. Live every day like a vacation! Title: I Say Organic
Description:
As an organization, we are committed to serving the purest, most natural form of food available to us. Constantly innovating and working towards a world free of chemicals, we pride ourselves on delivering to you, only what is worthy of being served at your home - Pure organic food. We conduct frequent lab tests and audits to ensure we are living up to our promise! In turn, our farmers trust us with their products and we trust you to make the right choice.
The Purpose: (From the founder)
When you eat well; you feel good. But what is good food? It is more than just taste and texture. It’s where it comes from. It’s who grows it. It’s what goes into it. It’s who it feeds. It’s simple. It’s natural. We dream for this food to be everywhere. For it to be the only kind of food available. And for the tag “organic” to disappear as a result. We exist to contribute to building that future. Organic is not a lifestyle. It’s life itself.

Title: HEART and SOUL Events
Description:
Heart and Soul is a match making service for discerning singles.
We fully understand the importance and the rightful need for privacy when it comes to matters such as these. And hence, we go all out to ensure that you meet like minded people in a comfortable and friendly setting. Our aim is for you to feel free and be at your best during interactions.
Given the modern day need and the profile of our clientele, we go the extra mile to specially curate events that are diverse in nature.
We deliberately keep our events a little more private by inviting smaller numbers in order for you to have a meaningful experience. By the end of the evening, you can remember names, recall who you had a meaningful connection with and given that strive to maintain and an almost.equal men to women balanced ratios, the whole deal makes it completely worth your while.
Most importantly, apart from the above, we have a screening process to make sure that all our events offer a safe, welcoming and inclusive environment where members feel confident about reaching out and forming connections with each other.
We have categorized our events in the following manner:
- Interactive Mixers: specially designed to have fun & ‘break the awkwardness’. A Must do!!
- Niche events curated around the activity of your interest: Do you have a hand for cooking or painting? Perhaps both? Reading or movies and much more. Wouldn’t this be a lot more fun to share it with that someone special. Come Discover!!
- Stimulating Workshops: specially designed & integrated with the sole aim for you to find YOUR-SELF. Come Seek!!
We also have a bespoke matchmaking making service where Match Making where we assist you in finding your in finding your proverbial ‘princess’ or ‘knight’ not in shining Armour.
Heart and soul helps you to optimize your chances of finding the ideal mate, and how do we do this? Well it’s simple .
We first meet you over coffee to understand your needs & an idea of what you desire in a match. . For those not reachable in person we’re just a call away. We are happy to connect over a call.
We have taken every little bit of care to ensure that our matchmaking process is smooth, safe & most importantly discrete for your comfort. We at H & S will meticulously only put forward those matches where we feel a 90% > level of compatibility. The most rewarding feeling for us would be when it works out for you. Your joy.
Address: Shanaz Building, 90 Nepeansea Road, Malabar Hill, South Mumbai

Title: The Hosteller
Description:
Welcome to The Hosteller. We are one of the fastest growing hostel chains in India, who believe in budget facilitation and maximum interaction. Our design-led hostels are built and spaced in such a way that you get the best of facilities, meet the best of people and experience the best of the local and global hostel culture. Our aim is to make India travel more. And India can travel more when they can stop saving up for trips months in advance and wasting away precious time making and breaking the same plans again and again. In our stylish yellow-black themed hostels, we provide clean and safe housing facilities, secured lockers, a well-stocked common kitchen, air conditioners, paid laundry services, equipped libraries, exclusive female dormitories, travel and transport services, a colourful and well stocked cafe, well lit common rooms, and wide open spaces where our fellow travellers can bond over cups of lip-smacking coffee. Each of our destinations also has an energetic travel desk, who are more than eager to help you out with any queries or scheduling. If you are a solo traveller, here is the one place you will never feel alone.
In the last four years; we have set up shop in more than 5 beautiful locations in India, hosted a whopping 20,000 travellers, entertained more than 1500 trekkers (750+ of whom are women) and garnered an excess of 900 positive reviews. Our team comprises of enthusiastic travellers who plan for everything in the most personal and authentic way possible. And it is all for YOU! What differs us from other hostels and establishments out there is our pocket-friendly travel packages that allow for you to have an all-encompassing experience of the entire town/city. Whether it be mountain treks, bungee jumping, river rafting, food walks, photography walks, city pub crawls, game nights, movie nights, star gazing bonfires, overnight camping trips – we have it all. And all of this – without creating a dent in your straining bank account. We pride ourselves on creating authentic as well as memorable experiences and friendships for our travellers, that stretch well beyond the vicinity of our hostels; and last well beyond the vicinity of your vacation. Come to The Hosteller, make a bunch of cool friends and avail our ever-expanding excursions to be whisked away to an adventure of your own.
Address: 123/1, Saidulajab, Saket, New Delhi, 110030 New Delhi, India
Phone: Also Available in: Bir, Kasol, Jaipur, Pushkar, Manali & McLeodganj

We proudly differentiate ourselves, by using the best quality & most exclusive raw material, from around the world. A cognizant shopper expects the best service and product, and we ensure that we give our genuine best every time!
Our designs are living, breathing memoirs of inspired craft, hand-made using age-old practices and techniques. While we take inspiration from timeless techniques, the designs created are contemporary and fashion-forward. Our craftsmen are dedicated to composing intricate creations which reflect the love and passion with which they were designed, unmatched by the mass-produced machine-made jewellery. We are steeped in history as we look forward to the future, making available our fashion jewellery, online for the tech-savvy, mindful shopper.
Address: Koramangala 3 Block, Koramangala, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560034

Title: TIESTA
Description: Every person is unique and has its unique sense of style, keeping this in mind, we, at TIESTA, craft a shoe after thoroughly understanding the customer's requirement and suggesting them our ideas. We make sizes from Euro 34 to Euro 44, which is rare to find. All our shoes are hand made, Vegan and PETA approved.
Address: Unit 301, Parvati Premises, Sunmill Compound Opp High Street Phoenix, Lower, Parel, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400013, India

Title: B:kind
Description: B:Kind is a lifestyle brand that deals in western fusion clothing for women of all ages and sizes. Founded by Vidhi Dalal in 2010, her vision for the brand was to marry the modern Indian woman's consumer needs with international trends and world-class quality. Today, the brand aspires to create more than just a functional bond with its customers. It forges a rather deeper connect that spurts from the compassion and kindness the brand stands for. B:Kind currently is a team of over 50 employees, present in 1200+ stores pan-India, and aims to reach out to every woman seeking to be a pathbreaker in her own stride.
Address: 4B, Prime Plaza,ITI Compound, B.M.Marg,Elphinstone Station (W), Mumbai, Maharashtra

Title: Indi Moda
Description: Women's clothing brand that designs clothing highlighting Indian fabric, print & artisanal techniques. We use best quality breathe able fabrics (mainly cotton) that retain their texture, colour & design after wash. We make dresses, kurtas, blouses, pants, etc.
Address: Shop no 6, Horizon Blg Gokhale Road, North, Dadar (W, Dadar West, Shivaji Park, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400028, India

Title: Scarlette
Description: Scarlette New Delhi, a charming and intimate Maison d’hôtes in the middle of south Delhi. Guesthouse of four rooms decorated with Indian heritage mixed with a French touch. This charming haven of peace nicely decorated with French taste mixed with an Indian touch, furnished with antic and contemporary furniture is a proper home-away-from-home for those who like serenity, calm and comfort. Home linen and nightwear handmade with Parisian design.
Address: B2/139, Krishna Nagar, Safdarjung Enclave, New Delhi, Delhi

Title: Namrata Puri
Description: Namrata Puri is an Indian-wear label known for its romantic and whimsical made-to-measure creations. In order to maintain the most stringent high-quality standards of garments and services, we control every process in the creation of your outfit. Our team of tailors, pattern cutters and designers, design and cut fabrics after a careful understanding of our client's lifestyle, needs and occasions that are brought to life in our studio which is then quality controlled and pieced together at our headquarters.

Title: Anubha Jain
Description:
Anubha Jain label brings forth a Unique Take on Denims, adding new flavor to an evergreen, perennial fabric.
For the love of Indigo\Typically Blue .
Address: A-35, G.T. Karnal Road, Industrial Area New Delhi, Delhi -110033

Title: Shiksha Bhansali
Description: At Shiksha Bhansali, We take Comfort, Quality & Luxury very seriously, which is why from the 100% organic fabrics and the techniques involved furthermore are nature friendly. The brand, is a perfect fit for every Tres-chic who believes in herself and her power of expression through the clothes she wears. Stitching together the 4C’s- Conscious, Chic, Comfortable & Classy, which remain the backbone of Shiksha Bhansali label- founded in 2016 with an aim to bridge thee gap between old-school and contemporary fashion with a sustainable and eco-friendly approach.

Title: Aarjavee
Description: Aarjavee is an online store handmade, handcrafted clothing and jewellery. It has Fresh, Ethical, Handmade, Comfortable, Contemporary for a modern look with aesthetic design.

Title: Salt Attire
Description:
Your Hunt for Affordable Luxury Business Casuals Stops Here! From perfect tailored pants & skirts, elegant yet comfortable dresses to simple formal shirts, we've got your back!
With contemporary designs, luxury fabrics, flattering fits for Indian body shapes, subtle but impressive details and unlimited alterations, Salt Attire offers 9am-9pm clothing, capsule wardrobes, styling and personalization services for the modern Indian woman.
Address: 821, Udyog Vihar Phase V, Phase V, Udyog Vihar, Sector 19, Gurugram, Haryana 122022

Title: Clove
Description: Clove is another pin on the luxury stores map in the city. At the helm is hotelier and entrepreneur Samyukta Nair who envisioned Clove as a welcoming space that allows one to linger and be as if you are shopping in the comfort of your own home. The selection includes brands known and loved across men and womenswear like Dhruv Kapoor, Aish, Kardo and Lacquer Embassy. Brands like Jewelry by Misho, home linen by Anavila and Shift, objects from Claymen, sleepwear from Dandelion and Fiona Caulfields’ Love Travel Guides are available at the store.
Address: Churchill Chambers, JA Allana Marg, Apollo Bandar, Colaba, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400001

Title: Knick Knack Nook
Description: Knick Knack Nook is your one-stop destination for fashion accessories in India-for every mood, need and occasion! We love versatility and you’ll never find ‘more of the same’ designs on our website! With our unique capsule collections and new product launches every month, you’ll keep wanting to come back for more. From jewelry like earrings, rings, chokers, necklaces, nose pins and bracelets to socks, bags, headbands and sunglasses- we’ve got it all.

Title: Lecoanet Hemant
Description: Lecoanet Hemant is a fashion label, founded by Didier Lecoanet and Hemant Sagar. The label initially was based in Rue du Faubourg Saint-Honoré, Paris and focussed only on haute couture designs. Lecoanet Hemant is an Indo-French clothing design company that started work in Paris, where it was recognised as Indian and has since moved to India to be recognised as French.
Address: A 22-23, Gurgaon Technology Park, Sector 34, Phase 2, Info Technology Park, Sector 33, Gurugram, Haryana

Title: Heelium
Description:
Heelium is an amalgamation of ‘helium’, the second lightest element and ‘heel’, the part of the foot that bears the most pressure. Our vision stands on four pillars – safety, high performance, sustainability, and innovation.
Using a thorough research and development model, we are working to create sportswear that’s simple yet effective in yielding a high performance.
Address: 300 NCL Innovation Park, Dr Homi Bhabha Rd, Pashan, Pune, Maharashtra 411008

Title: Tailor Didi
Description: Tailor Didi has handcrafted and hand block printed to enchant you with mystical flora and fauna. Relish in the intricate art of block printing, made on fine cotton, the angrakha kurta is adorned with delicate lace on a colour. Our ethnic-rocker set is crafted in earthy tones and woven in fine cotton.

Title: Claymango.com
Description: Claymango.com is a indispensable wardrobe accessory. It is a quintessential for a prom night or a date night (who doesn't want to look hot on a date, right?) a wedding, during festivals/occasions, with work wear (just to add a little drama). To make a striking appearance, pair these wooden bowties with not just formals but also with casuals. Uniquely made for our customers who have an eccentric taste and loves to steal the thunder. You would want to show off these even in the subway. These are uniquely made keeping in mind today’s consumer/audience who would want to be different and experimental. The beautiful and elegant accessory come in a beautiful laser engraved wooden box, so it is ready as a gift to yourself or someone special. Our wood accessories are the perfect gift for any man.
Address: 46/61, 2nd Floor, Manmohan Building, Yusuf Sarai,, Green Park, New Delhi, Delhi 110016

Title: Mrittika
Description: Mrittika is an Indian fashion accessories brand of Rumi Craft LLP that aims to provide its clientele with products exhibiting an elevated aesthetic, made with authentic handcrafted fabrics and leather alternatives, while working directly with a myriad of craft clusters in India, with emphasis on fair pay, sustainability, social conscience and transparency.
Address: No. 98, 2nd Main Road, Moogambigai Nagar, Nainarmandapam, Pondicherry (PY) – 605004

Title: Chokhi.chorri
Description: Chokhi chorri provides you with ethically curated and sustainably created women clothes that are pure, simple, earthy, youthful, elegant and inspired. Now let your clothes speak for who you are!
Address: CG-89, CG Block, Sector II, Bidhannagar, Kolkata, West Bengal 700091

Title: Rengé
Description: Rengé is sustainably producing luxe ethical clothing at a reduced cost to both you and the environment. They on a mission to sustainably produce luxe, ethical clothing at a reduced cost to both you and the environment. We will never compromise on this and use only the finest fabrics for your wardrobe staples. They believe this is how all women are - strong, resilient and gorgeous.
Address: Plot No. 18, 1, Sector 32 DLF Area, Block C, DLF Industrial Area, Sector 32, Faridabad, Haryana

Title: Dharai
Description: Dharai was conceived out of our generation’s desire to slow down and adopt a more mindful way of life. Literally meaning form, Dharai was conceptualised to bring together a line of conscious clothing, by accentuating the form and functionality of each piece in the collection.

Title: Ayurganic
Description: Created under the supervision of Ayurvedic Scientists in India, A Y U R G A N I C represents a new benchmark in consciously curated apparel. Wearing Ayurganic is an act of responsibility, sustainability and consciousness.
Address: A 22-23 Gurgaon Technology Park Sector 34 Infocity Gurgaon, Haryana– 122001

Title: KNYA
Description: KNYA is a modern and mindful fashion brand offering fashion pieces for the contemporary wardrobe. Here, detailed designing and quality that lives beyond the seasons are available for women.
Address: A-60, F Block, Phase 2, Okhla Phase II, Okhla Industrial Area, New Delhi, Delhi

Title: Ella
Description: Ella by Ritika was born out of the desire to provide beautiful and fashionable everyday clothing to women across India and the globe. We are inspired by a kind of contemporary, self-confident woman, for whom we design feminine fashion. We have evolved to incorporate classic styles, but with wearability still very much a priority.
Address: Shop No. - 204, 36 Turner Road, 36 Turner Rd, Bandra, Mumbai, Maharashtra

Title: AMAANYA
Description: Amaanya provides a complete collection of exclusive handwoven and hand-embellished scarves and stoles. Hand-crafted by our expert in-house artisans, the products are skillfully woven by the weavers in the Himalayas of India.
Address: E-16, South Extension, Block E, South Extension I, New Delhi, Delhi

Title: Mallika by Alpana & Gopika Kapoor
Description: Alpana's work is an innovative fusion that was carefully crafted keeping in consideration the centuries of the cultural heritage of traditional jewellery. An inspiring journey that commenced many years ago while designing her own jewellery, Alpana Kapoor’s creations are striking, graceful and affordable. Every piece is an exquisite piece of art; every carving of gold and every stone has its own story to tell. Her work is an innovative fusion that was carefully crafted with her muse as the contemporary Indian woman, keeping in consideration the centuries of the cultural heritage of traditional Indian jewellery. The ethos of the brand is to make every woman feel as royal and regal as a Maharani.

Title: Born Flash
Description: Studio Accessories started as a passion for creating beautiful designs and delivering quality. Since we have been exporting for a decade now and had some award-winning pieces showcased in the woman's world magazine. Nidhi is the founder of Studio Accessories, She started Studio Accessories in 2010. Nidhi graduated from NIFT and is very passionate about design. wanted to give a taste of it to our lovely ladies in India and launched studio Accessories as a brand here.
Address: 11, Silver Oak Farms, Road No.1, Ghitorni, M.G. Road, New Delhi, Delhi

Title: Valliyan
Description: VALLIYAN is a pioneer in the Demi fine jewellery space in India. Established in 2008, It is deep rooted in Indian Luxury and Spirituality with an international cross cultural aesthetic. The pieces are entirely hand made by 4th generation artisans using techniques that are dying, for fresh ideas that make for original design.
Address: Dalamal Chambers, 602, Behind Income Tax office, New Marine Lines, Churchgate, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400020

Title: House Of Zeniaa
Description: House of Zeniaa is a brand created for women who value style and like to add a twist to make each ensemble their own. Our philosophy is to provide elegant silhouettes while maintaining quality. House of Zeniaa embraces unique wardrobe staples. We are inspired by today’s youth who not only aspires to be fashionable but also imbibe modesty in their attire. We are based in India.
Address: 38, Rani Jhansi Rd, Block A, Motia Khan, Jhandewalan, New Delhi, Delhi

Title: House of Ekam
Description:
House of Ekam aims to provide one of a kind home products which unify your home. Each product of ours is thoughtfully sourced from niche manufacturers and artisans in different regions in India having premium craftsmanship along with affordable pricing.
Our brand takes inspiration from traditional techniques mixed with millennial designs. Each product of ours is designed by us keeping in mind the aesthetics and utility. As a principle we ship the products ourselves, keeping the quality control totally in our hands.
Address: 23, Indrasagar Apartments, Civil Lines Nagpur, Maharashtra

Title: Atulyakala
Description: They are India's first deaf-run lifestyle brand. Behind every product is a process of change. They believe in the capabilities of the Deaf community of India. Our goal is to bridge the gap between the deaf & the hearing community designing a better future where we interact, learn, share & create together.
Address: 2nd floor, 271, Satya Niketan, South Moti Bagh, New Delhi, Delhi

Title: Burloe
Description: Our story is simple: We make great shoes for an even greater & better woman. Unlike trends that come with an injunction and an expiry date, the classics dictate a more time-honoured conviction.
Address: MIDC Industrial Area, Rabale, Navi Mumbai, Maharashtra 400701

Title: Stone Metal Scissors
Description: Stone.Metal.Scissors. is a small, impulsive endeavour where we narrate our stories through creative expression, using simple stone, metal and scissors. Our wonderland is filled with an eclectic mix of statement pieces, intricate patterns and a mind brimming with curiosity. Our aim is to simply create pieces that uplift your ensembles and bring out your personality.
Address: 4th Floor, We Work, Platina towers, Mehrauli-Gurgaon Road, Gurugram, Haryana

Title: Krafted with Happiness
Description: Krafted with Happiness is India's ultimate online shopping destination for quirky jewellery, bohemian accessories, clothing, bags, comfortable footwear at affordable prices. They ship worldwide.

Title: Sureena Chowdhri
Description: If you are a bridesmaid, or even a bride, head to Sureena Chowdhri store to find stunning pieces. Not only the colour palette (think dusty tones, pastel shades) will attract you but intricate embroidery on the garments will make you stare.
Address: M-47, M Block Main Market, Greater Kailash 1, New Delhi,Delhi, 110048

Title: Saahra
Description: Saahra is India's first multi-designer store dedicated to sustainable and fair trade artisanal craftsmanship. Saahra Sustain, our in-house timeless collection paying tribute to the modern feminine will be available online. Embracing the spirit of being conscious, Saahra is a multi-designer boutique for sustainable and ethically crafted fashion and lifestyle products. Our e-boutique with a curated collection of contemporary and conscious fashion, beauty and lifestyle.
Address: 1, Central Ave, Block B, Maharani Bagh, New Friends Colony, New Delhi, Delhi

Title: Play Clan
Description: Play Clan combines fashion, art and design to create collections in home, apparel, gifts and stationery, inspired by vibrant colours and local culture. Play Clan celebrates life in India and reflects the energy and inspiration taken from the people of modern India and everyday observations. With prestigious collaborations with Sir Paul Smith, Absolut, Levi's Strauss and India Fashion Week, Play Clan is here to create a parallel world, an alternate reality.
Address: 23, Ground Floor, Siri Fort Road, New Delhi, Delhi

Title: The House of Tara
Description: The House Of Tara is a registered brand, which is primarily involved in the manufacturing of bags and other soft goods. It was started in the year 2012 by the promoters of its parent company (Zeest Exports), at a time when e-commerce was ready to take-off in India. Plenty of overseas experience, keeping in line with international trends, understanding and adhering to stringent quality standards, testing protocols, efficient pricing and timely shipments have helped us to create a distinct identity.
Address: Pocket H, Nirvana Country, Sector 50, Gurugram, Haryana

Title: Crazy/Lazy
Description:
We provide a wide range of night suits , available in various prints and sizes. We cater to the needs of women, men and kids of any age group.
SO COME BE CRAZY AND LAZY WITH US ..
Address: Model Town , New Delhi, Delhi, India,110009

Title: Confidential Couture
Description: Confidential Couture Promise to bring to you a guilt-free shopping experience, offering pre-loved designer accessories at great prices and with trusted authentication. We take pride in creating a trusted network of buyers and sellers of luxury products while maintaining absolute confidentiality. Not only are the products assured in authenticity from Los Angeles based organization Authenticate First, but we also take out special time and effort to curate a collection of items that will add value to our wardrobes.
Address: 1106 ,Akashdeep building, 26A, Barakhamba Road, New Delhi, Delhi

Title: Baariqi
Description: Baariqi provides you with Handcrafted Women's wear with fashionable designs to personifies one's personality. All our products are handcrafted with love in pure fabrics. We stand for sustainable fashion and fair trade practices.

Title: Avishekk Naiya
Description: The house of Avishekk Naiya produces unique and exquisite pieces which are handcrafted with quality finish. The company specializes in making Indian and Indo-Western garments for men and women in various different categories ranging from ready to wear, occasion wear and bridal wear. Keeping in mind about the comfort and sustainability it focuses in using pure hand-woven and khadi fabrics in most of the collections.
Address: Avishek Naiya, 269, Banku Bihari Chatterjee Rd, Rath Tala, Kasba, Kolkata, West Bengal 700042

Title: CHOKHAA
Description: CHOKHAA the house of purity is dedicated to present Exclusive Handcrafted Products. We are working towards creating a Customized Zone. As a brand, they are continuously creating fresh & exquisite designs, hence adding quality to our customer's life.
Address: M 18, Sagar Vihar Colony, Vaishali Nagar, Ajmer, Rajasthan

Title: Kanelle
Description: Kanelle by Kanika Jain is a designer brand, created for women who value style, comfort, quality and like to add a twist, to make each ensemble their own. Kanelle currently offers a wide range of products for women, including western wear as well as traditional festive wear.
Address: A-296/1, Okhla Phase-1 New Delhi

Title: PAVITRA Deogarh
Description: Pavitra Deogarh is a design-led lifestyle brand that offers Modern and Sophisticated Design. They bring colours and creativity to everyday items through the original. The essence of the label Pavitra Deogarh rests in the Indian textile process wherein the material passes through the hands of the various craftsperson.

Title: Nidhi Munim
Description: The most fabulous swimwear - from monokinis to bikinis, as well as effortlessly chic resort wear! As an added bonus, we also design bespoke swimwear, as per your exact needs. Sexy Elegant & Definitive Swimwear, Cover-ups, Resort wear & Athleisure.

Title: NETE.IN
Description: Nete.in (pronounced as netty) is an address where shoppers have everything filtered. It provides you an esoteric collection of clothing and accessories lateral and unique; one that will be a mix for an upbeat and obscure side of an individual.

Title: Ekadi
Description: Ekadi provides you with contemporary women’s wear sustainable clothing which includes Angrakhas, Kurtas, Choli's , Skirts, Sarees, Wrap Tunics, Dupatta's and stoles. The essence of the label Ekadi rests in the Indian textile process wherein the material passes through the hands of various crafts person.

Title: House Of Baalee
Description: At House of बाली, shop the Stylish and Sophisticated sparkle from our exquisite collection of traditional 925 and contemporary gold plated earrings. Your outfit of the day is incomplete without those perfect pair of earrings!
